## Summary
::: {.incremental}
- BrainGlobe provides open source tools for computational neuroanatomy
- Modular, interoperable, atlas-agnostic design
- Active and growing community of users and contributors
    - Comprehensive documentation and tutorials
    - Ongoing development and maintenance
    - Workshops and training events
:::
